faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our pricing

questions.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan later?
questions.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

questions.question: Is there a free trial available?
questions.answer: Yes, all plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.

questions.question: Do you offer discounts for non-profits?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer special pricing for educational and non-profit organizations. Contact our sales team for details.

questions.question: What happens when I exceed my limits?
questions.answer: You'll receive notifications as you approach your limits. You can upgrade your plan or purchase add-ons.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption and security measures to protect your data.
